North_Little_Rock.Amboy Overpass: The Amboy Overpass is a historic bridge in North Little Rock, Arkansas. Built in 1941, it carries MacArthur Drive (Arkansas Highway 365) across the railroad tracks of the Union Pacific Railroad in the northwestern part of the city. It is a twelve-span structure with a total length of 573 feet (175 m), whose longest span is 80 feet (24 m).
